message: The FREQ_COLL field for indicator 14-b-1, translated into all languages

data.en: The questionnaire is sent out on a biennial basis. It is expected to be sent out towards the end of the year prior to the holding of the Committee on Fisheries and remain open for a 2-3 month period, alterations of this calendar are subject to changes in the timing of the Committee on Fisheries.
data.fr:
Calendrier

Collecte de données :

Le prochain cycle de collecte de données sera mené et achevé d'ici mai 2018.
data.ru:
Календарь

Сбор данных:

Следующий цикл сбора данных будет проведен и завершен к маю 2018 года.
